title: Puerto Rico's long road to recovery
itunes:title: Puerto Rico's long road to recovery
description: Almost three months after Hurricane Maria made landfall in Puerto Rico, the U.S. territory is still struggling to get basic necessities like water and power. The islands were already dealing with a crushing amount of debt before the storms, how should the U.S. help its territory recover?
